item.title: 阿根廷不提供比索债券看跌期权阻碍债务互换
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，阿根廷央行没有为政府本周在创纪录的债务互换中出售的比索债券提供看跌期权，此举阻碍了私人银行参与这笔交易。【原文：Argentina’s central bank isn’t offering put options for peso bonds the government is selling this week in a record debt swap, a move that’s discouraged private banks from participating in the deal, according to two people with direct knowledge.】

item.title: 房地产和基础设施亏损削弱安大略省教师的回报率
item.description: 安大略省教师养老金计划去年的收益率为 1.9%，远远低于其基准，原因是信贷和股票的强劲业绩被硬资产的损失所掩盖。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan gained 1.9% last year, underperforming its benchmark by a wide margin, as strong results in credit and stocks were overshadowed by losses in hard assets.】

item.title: 交易员解读最新美国通胀报告，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 由于交易商在消化一份关键的美国通胀报告，以寻找美联储何时可能开始降息的迹象，黄金收窄了早些时候的跌幅。【原文：Gold pared earlier losses as traders digested a key US inflation report for indications of when the Federal Reserve may start cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 津巴布韦称炙热的厄尔尼诺模式导致玉米作物枯萎
item.description: 津巴布韦警告说，由于炙热的厄尔尼诺天气模式，种植玉米的农田减少了 12%，这威胁到该国的主食，并可能引发价格飙升和社会动荡。【原文：Zimbabwe warned that farmland planted with corn has shrunk by 12% because of scorching El Niño weather patterns, threatening the nation’s food staple and potentially triggering surging prices and social unrest.】

item.title: 伊拉克继续超额抽油，欧佩克石油供应削减陷入僵局
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）最新的石油供应削减计划停滞不前，原因是经常藐视该组织协议的伊拉克连续第二个月产量超过配额。【原文：OPEC’s latest oil supply cuts stalled as Iraq — which has often flouted the group’s agreements — produced above its quota for a second month.】

item.title: 黄金矿工错过了金银创纪录的上涨行情
item.description:
尽管金属涨势迅猛，但跟踪生产商的基金却表现平平。【原文：

Funds tracking producers are stubbornly flat despite the metal’s blistering rally.

】

item.title: Signa 部门在重组计划中向债权人提供 30% 的回收率
item.description: Signa Development Selection AG 是 Rene Benko 破产的房地产集团中两个主要单位中较小的一个，该公司在重组方案中向债权人返还 30% 的资金。【原文：Signa Development Selection AG, the smaller of two main units in Rene Benko’s insolvent property group, is offering creditors 30% of their money back in a restructuring proposal.】

item.title: 家得宝与 NCAA 和沙克合作开展 "疯狂三月 "营销活动
item.description: 家得宝公司（Home Depot Inc.【原文：Home Depot Inc. is expanding its marketing efforts with a three-year NCAA deal that will be timed to begin with this year’s March Madness tournament.】

item.title: 瑞典央行行长希望尽量减少比特币在金融领域的应用
item.description: 瑞典央行行长试图让比特币交易远离该国的金融体系，并在加密货币创下历史新高后就潜在的损失发出警告。【原文：Sweden’s central bank governor seeks to keep Bitcoin trading away from the country’s financial system, warning about potential losses after the crypto currency has reached new all-time highs.】

item.title: BAT 出售 21 亿美元 ITC 后开始回购
item.description: Lucky Strike 香烟制造商英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco Plc）计划出售印度合作伙伴 ITC Ltd. 多达 21 亿美元的股份，此举将有助于该公司向股东返还现金并投资于自身业务。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc, the maker of Lucky Strike cigarettes, plans to sell as much as $2.1 billion of shares in Indian partner ITC Ltd. in a move that will help it return cash to shareholders and invest in its business.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 8920 亿美元财富基金加大私人信贷押注
item.description: 阿布扎比 8920 亿美元的主权财富基金正在加大对房地产私人信贷基金的投入，这是财大气粗的中东投资者希望在该资产类别中发挥关键作用的最新迹象。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s $892 billion sovereign wealth fund is upping its commitment to a real estate private credit fund, the latest sign that deep-pocketed Middle Eastern investors are looking to play a pivotal role in the asset class.】

item.title: StanChart 肯尼亚分公司利润飙升，将派发创纪录股息
item.description: 渣打银行肯尼亚有限公司（Standard Chartered Bank Kenya Ltd.）在削减政府债务投资、专注于贷款和财富管理业务的决定取得成效后，提议派发创纪录的股息。【原文：Standard Chartered Bank Kenya Ltd. has proposed a record dividend after its decision to slash investment in government debt and focus on its lending and wealth business paid off.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在关键的 CPI 数据公布之前，股市上涨，美国银行上调了对美国盈利增长的展望，而杰米-戴蒙戳破了对软着陆的乐观情绪。【原文：Good morning. Stocks rise before key CPI data, Bank of America upgrades its outlook for US earnings growth while Jamie Dimon punctures optimism over a soft landing. — David Goodman】

item.title: 会计调查后，ADM 修订内部销售年限
item.description: Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司在对其财务报告进行内部调查后，修订了过去三年的分部间销售额，并披露了与动物营养部门有关的 1.37 亿美元减值费用。该公司股价在早盘交易中上涨。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. revised its intersegment sales for the last three years following an internal probe into its financial reporting and disclosed a $137 million impairment charge related to its animal nutrition unit. The shares rose in early trading.】

item.title: EQT开始评估投资者对新亚洲收购基金的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，EQT AB 正在筹建一个新的专注于亚洲的收购基金，目前正处于评估投资者兴趣的早期阶段。【原文：EQT AB is targeting raising a new Asia-focused buyout fund and is in the early stages of gauging investor interest, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油运输量回升至今年最高水平
item.description:
截至3月10日的一周内，太平洋地区货运量激增，使总货运量达到每天370万桶

。【原文：

Pacific cargoes surged to take overall flows to 3.7 million barrels a day in the week to March 10

】

item.title: StanChart 首席执行官竞争者库珀将在大调整中离职
item.description: 随着渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）推进更广泛的管理层重组以提高回报率，接替该公司首席执行官比尔-温特斯（Bill Winters）的热门人选即将离职。【原文：A frontrunner to replace Standard Chartered Plc Chief Executive Officer Bill Winters is set to depart as the emerging markets lender pushes through a broader management reshuffle to boost returns.】

item.title: 美国通胀交易搅乱了债券市场的拍卖计划
item.description: 未来几天，债券交易员有很多事情要做，即使在他们消化了一个关键的美国通胀数据之后，这个数据将影响未来几个月对美联储政策的预期。【原文：Bond traders have plenty on their plates the next couple days, even after they absorb a crucial US inflation reading that stands to shape expectations for Federal Reserve policy for months to come.】

item.title: 中国万科与银行进行债务置换谈判以避免违约
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科集团公司正在与银行商谈债务置换事宜，这将有助于这家资金短缺的开发商避免首次债券违约。【原文：China Vanke Co. is in talks with banks on a debt swap that would help the cash-strapped developer stave off its first-ever bond default, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯索科尔原油积压缓慢清理，货物运往中国
item.description: 积压在新加坡和韩国附近海域的俄罗斯 Sokol 原油货物正在慢慢清理，俄罗斯正在为这一以前深受印度炼油商青睐的原油等级寻找新的买家。【原文：A backlog of cargoes of Russia’s Sokol crude that built up off Singapore and South Korea is slowly clearing, with Russia seeking out new buyers for a grade previously favored by Indian refiners.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称本田和日产考虑削减在华产能
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，日产汽车公司正在考虑将在中国的产能削减 30%，而本田汽车公司则打算削减 20%。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. is considering a 30% reduction in production capacity in China, while Honda Motor Co. intends to cut 20%, the Nikkei reported.】

item.title: 前红杉印度公司为早期风险企业成立新基金
item.description: 前红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）旗下的 Peak XV Partners 正在创建一个新基金，该基金将参股全球种子基金和早期风险基金，并进行其他不属于其现有投资组合范围的投资。【原文：Peak XV Partners, formerly part of Sequoia Capital, is creating a new fund that will take stakes in global seed and early venture funds, and make other investments that fall outside the purview of its existing portfolios.】

item.title: 德国工业的海外投资意愿依然不强
中国交易员第 19 天买入香港股市，创 11 个月来最长纪录
item.description: 中国内地交易员已连续第19个交易日净买入港股，创下自2023年4月以来最长的连续净买入纪录，原因是经济数据出现绿芽以及中国政府为改善市场情绪而采取的救市措施吸引他们加大买入力度。恒生科技指数是进入技术性牛市的最新指标，其他主要基准也接近这一里程碑。【原文：Mainland Chinese traders have net bought Hong Kong shares for a 19th-straight session, the longest streak since April 2023, as green shoots in economic data and Beijing’s rescue efforts to improve sentiment entice them to boost purchases. The Hang Seng Tech Index is the latest gauge to enter a technical bull market, while other key benchmarks are also nearing that milestone.】

item.title: 美银美林策略师上调 S&P 500 盈利预测，加入顶级牛股行列
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师们认为，在经济恢复性增长和人工智能突破的推动下，2024 年 S&P 500 指数的盈利将超过预期。【原文：The S&P 500 will deliver stronger-than-expected earnings in 2024, powered by resilient economic growth and artificial intelligence breakthroughs, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists, who are now among Wall Street’s most bullish profit forecasters.】

item.title: 日本央行不参与 ETF 被视为股市更健康的一步
item.description: 日本央行周一在股价下跌的情况下出人意料地没有购买交易所交易基金，这引发了市场对该行将停止购买交易所交易基金的猜测，以试图通过提高交易员的流动性和减少价格扭曲来使日本股市更加健康。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s surprise lack of exchange-traded fund buying on Monday despite a drop in shares is spurring speculation the bank will stop purchasing ETFs, to try to make the nation’s stock market healthier by boosting liquidity for traders and reducing price distortion.】

item.title: 欧盟财长支持格奥尔基耶娃连任国际货币基金组织总裁
item.description: 比利时财政部长文森特-范佩泰格姆（Vincent Van Peteghem）表示，欧盟各国财政部长支持克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃连任国际货币基金组织总裁。【原文：European Union finance ministers are backing Kristalina Georgieva for a second term as head of the International Monetary Fund, Belgian Finance Minister Vincent Van Peteghem said.】

item.title: 欧洲对美国国债的回应即将达到 1 万亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲最安全证券的市场规模看来将有史以来首次超过 1 万亿欧元（1.1 万亿美元）。【原文：The market for Europe’s safest securities looks set to grow beyond €1 trillion ($1.1 trillion) for the first time on record.】

item.title: 中国吸引购物者，香港大型杂货连锁店纷纷关店
item.description: 香港第三大连锁超市 U Select 由国有企业华润集团经营，在不到一年的时间里，随着香港零售商在经济逆风中挣扎，以及居民涌向边境寻求更便宜的购物方式，U Select 的网络几乎缩小了一半。【原文：Hong Kong’s third-largest supermarket chain U Select, run by state-owned conglomerate China Resources Holdings Co., has almost halved its network in less than a year as the city’s retailers struggle with economic headwinds and residents flock across the border for cheaper shopping.】

item.title: Persimmon 预计今年英国房屋销售将再遇挑战
item.description: 英国开发商Persimmon Plc表示，即使在投资者预期降息的情况下，公司也做好了迎接另一个挑战年的准备。【原文：UK developer Persimmon Plc said it’s prepared for another challenging year even amid investor expectations of interest-rate cuts.】
